last_episode_to_air.name: The Reunion
last_episode_to_air.overview: The six couples from season two return to chat with host Maja Bohosiewicz about their relationships, plus never-before-seen outtakes are shown.

name: Love Never Lies: Poland
overview: Six couples test their trust with an eye-scanning lie detector in this reality series where deception costs money, and the truth comes with a prize.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Six couples test their trust with an eye-scanning lie detector in this reality series where deception costs money, and the truth comes with a prize.

tagline: Actor and influencer Maja Bohosiewicz hosts Netflix's first Polish unscripted reality series.

episodes.name: Time to Face the Truth
episodes.overview: After the couples settle into the villa, learn the rules and toast to their adventures, they get a bitter taste of the truth at their first ceremony.

episodes.name: Temptation Arrives
episodes.overview: With the group divided between two villas, the contestants resist new temptations and struggle to reconcile what they learned about their partners.

episodes.name: Thin Ice
episodes.overview: The contestants at Villa Duża watch as their partners get to know the flirty newcomers. A new Eye Detect test brings out painful revelations.

episodes.name: An Eye for an Eye
episodes.overview: Insecurities and doubts mount at the new location when new guests bid for the hearts of Bruno, Ida, Kasia, Jasiek, Andrzej and Bernadeta.

episodes.name: The Truth Hurts Most
episodes.overview: While their partners enjoy the company of visitors, Lilia, Mateusz, Kornel, Jędrzej, Dominik and Wiktoria reexamine the future of their relationships.

episodes.name: The Last Chance
episodes.overview: Still reeling from the emotional ceremony, Jędrzej searches for a way to move forward. The residents of Villa Duża say goodbye to their visitors.

episodes.name: Happily Ever After?
episodes.overview: The couples reunite to confront the consequences of their lies and indiscretions and to find out who will walk away with the grand prize.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Six couples test their trust with an eye-scanning lie detector in this reality series where deception costs money, and the truth comes with a prize.

episodes.name: Soft Landing, Hard Truth
episodes.overview: Host Maja Bohosiewicz welcomes six new couples to the villa; the results of the first round of lie detector questions are revealed on the first night.

episodes.name: Demons From the Past
episodes.overview: Emotions run high the morning after the first ceremony; one partner in each couple is sent to the Villa of Temptation, as six new singles join the group.

episodes.name: Hocus Pocus: Go Away, Temptation
episodes.overview: The participants in the Villa of Doubt must choose whether to spend money from the prize pot to watch video clips of their partners on their dates.

episodes.name: Sweet Revenge
episodes.overview: The groups switch villas. After watching video clips of how their partners behaved, will the original Villa of Doubt team take revenge?

episodes.name: Time to Put Myself First
episodes.overview: The tables are turned as the original Villa of Temptation group watches video clips of their partners going on their dates.

episodes.name: We're Even
episodes.overview: Amanda, Paulina, Sandra, and the others watch video clips of their partners reacting to their dates, leading to intense emotions and new perspectives.

episodes.name: Second Chances?
episodes.overview: The couples reunite and face the results of their last round in front of the EyeDetect. Who will stay together, and who will win the prize?

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: The six couples from season two return to chat with host Maja Bohosiewicz about their relationships, plus never-before-seen outtakes are shown.
